About Me

Hi My name is Diego, I'm Italian and I love coding and Photography. I started to code just 2 Years ago but it's really something I like and I would like to do as a Job. To be a Front end Developer is my Goal. After I did a short course at the Dublin Institute of Design where I learned the basic of HTML and CSS.Then I did a full Year in the same college and I got an Higher National Certificate in Media Productions

I'm countinuing studying on Udemy(at the Moment I'm doing a course in Javascript) and I started recently the Techdegree by Treehouse in Front End. I have already some projects on Github. I'm really passionate in what I do...

Your Project is in Safe Hands

From a Psd I'm able to create a simple clear Fully Responsive Website
